title: Three Nominations Sent to the Senate Today – The White House
content:
Nominations & Appointments			
Issued on:
May 18, 2017
NOMINATIONS SENT TO THE SENATE:Claire M. Grady, of Pennsylvania, to be Under Secretary for Management, Department of Homeland Security, vice Russell C. Deyo.Neomi Rao, of the District of Columbia, to be Administrator of the Office of Information and Regulatory Affairs, Office of Management and Budget, vice Howard A. Shelanski.David J. Redl, of New York, to be Assistant Secretary of Commerce for Communications and Information, vice Lawrence E. Strickling.
